short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert twitter/x threads to easy to read article. It is a New thread reader app and it unrolls a twitter thread.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing a new thread reader app! It allows users to convert long Twitter threads or series of tweets into a single article. Many people know it as a thread reader app.

Keeping up with long threads or series of tweets can be very difficult and extremely frustrating. To help our Twitter users, we have developed an easy-to-use tool.

UnrollNow v2:
UnrollNow v2 comes with more features. You can now directly unroll any thread from the "Home" and "Search" pages. A small icon appears below every post on Twitter. Simply click the unroll icon on any tweet.

For v1 and v2 users:
Go to any parent tweet of a thread on X (formerly Twitter). Click on the UnrollNow extension, and then click the "Unroll This Thread" button. Your longer threads will now be converted into easy-to-follow articles.
